Detailed Description

TAKTUK Network implementation based of taktuk communication utilities. The initialization of such TAKTUK Network is based on information in the properties files and into the extra properties passed as extra arguments. The properties files may have following informations for TAKTUKNET network:

enum TAKTUKNET::Device::Status

Server stub, process a message from a Connexion

Parameters:
cc the call context to receive the message
Returns:
0 if ok
1 if connexion is closed
2 if remote node is shutdown
else an error occurs and an exception is thrown
Exceptions:
ComFailure 
Enumerator:
S_OK 
S_CLOSED 
S_SHUTDOWN
